question: Hello -I am in a committed relationship & getting married with girl with Type I diabetes from last 15 yrs. I would like to understand what all complication I need to face in future sothat I will be prepared. Her A1C is always in 6.5-7. We usually have medical checkups in every 6 months or so.I have few questions in my Mind -- Is there any effect on life expectancy?- Is there will be any complication during pregnancy?- Is there any issue with sexual health?Any information will be helpful? your views?experiences? etc...
title: Type I diabetes
